page.title: 02CHANGES IN HURST GREEN
page.content: Limited changes and growth has been seen. A railway in 1884 and houses were built around there. There were big houses with fields. Now there are housing estates. Local schools are {Merle Common, Beadles Lane}and{Oxted {County.}This was one big building and later extra huts were built. Now there are middle schools in the area. There were less shops{Butchers, Farm {shops}(most jobs were for farmers), {Grocers}and a{Fish shop.}Now there are 16 shops including hairdressers. Many roads are named after landmarks. Most of them are now housing estates. Buses used to come every 15 minutes, now it is every hour. The population has increased and new estates have been built to house them. After the war an industrial estate was built. Many people nearby work here. Other people work in places reached by rail.
